reviews.review: Нуууууууууууууууууууууу. А что сказать? Приколна. Легко пройти, много легких багов чтоб пройти быстрее. Разве что голос противный. Я включил японскую ГЛаДОС чтоб было приятнее.
да да и да
This game is very fun. It is quite short if you want to finish it one one sitting. The puzzles are difficult but fun and the story is great too.

Truly one of the best games ever made, with lots of bonus content after you finish the game: extra hard puzzles, challenge rooms, and of course finding all those darn radios! I also highly recommend Portal Pro as the best of the original Portal mods. The only game better than Portal is the sequel.

A true classic in videogame history. I dont have to explain or tell you what this game is. You already know it :D! The only question is: Should i buy this game? YES. I recommend getting the bundle (Portal 1 and 2) because the first game is pretty short (i beated it in almost 3h).

10/10
will recommend :)

sad face

Puzzle game, with sweat inducing moments. The story and exploration are great too. Great for people who are new to video games, as there's no time pressure to solve the puzzles and progress. Puzzles are solved with logic and creative thinking, so you feel smart when you solve them. The game looks good, even with my bare minimum hardware.

I was informed that there will be cake at the end.

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE
Fun but very short.

Portal is THE  game. Everyone, even people who don't play videogames normally can enjoy this game. It's pretty simplistic in it's premise, yet executes it perfectly. And even though it doesn't really have that much of a story, the player can still find hints to what happened at aperture science. The puzzles are challenging at times, but never frustrating.
Rating 10/10

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.
